summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of interactive glass sphere landing page. All 10 specified features tested and working perfectly.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with 'SOON PLACES' title visible (Anton font)
12 glass sphere bubbles render with images inside (all loaded successfully)
Click blur-motion animation effect working (800ms duration)
Glass sphere overlay effects visible (specular highlights, rim lights, radial gradients)
Subtitle 'DISCOVER THE WORLD' appears at top
Scroll hint appears at bottom with proper opacity behavior
Masonry 2-column layout with 40px right column offset
Hover effects show place name labels
Multiple bubble size variations (lg, md, sm) working
CSS keyframe animations properly defined and executing
